titleStmt.title: Aristippus, or, The Ioviall philosopher presented in a priuate shew : to which is added, The conceited pedler.
titleStmt.author: Randolph, Thomas, 1605-1635.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Randolph by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
